snippet: A rescue operation was under way in a rural part of western China after a landslide buried a village in Yunnan Province, killing at least 42 people and injuring two others.
abstract: Chinese officials say rescue operation is under way in rural western China after landslide buries village in Yunnan Province, killing at least 42 people and injuring two others.
lead_paragraph: A rescue operation was under way in a rural part of western China after a landslide buried a village in Yunnan Province, killing at least 42 people and injuring two others.

headline.seo: China: Landslide Buries a Rural Village
headline.main: China: Landslide Buries a Rural Village
headline.print_headline: China: Landslide Buries a Rural Village
